Talents.Name: Automatic Typewriter
Talents.Description: Can summon a "Typewriter" for 25s; the "Typewriter" has the same skill as this unit, and has its own Redeployment Time

Talents.Name: Stenographer of Weaknesses
Talents.Description: Attacks from the "Typewriter" reduce the target's DEF by 18% for 4 seconds; if the Typewriter is placed within the 4 tiles adjacent to <Operator Name>, this effect increases to to 23%
